name: 2048: The Block Bash
description:
• The ability to cycle individiual rows and columns
  • Solid Blocks (Black Blocks) that don't move when you move other blocks
    • Solid blocks are destroyed and turned into regular blokcs when you merge two normal blocks in one of the adjacent spots. The two blocks must have values that add up to the value of the solid block.
    • Solid blocks can be moved by cycling rows or columns
  • Simply use WASD or Arrow Keys to shift the whole grid around like the traditional 2048
  • The arrows allow you to shift their respective row or column
  • You can use the dropdown at the bottom of the screen to change the color theme of the game :)
  • Using the "New Game" button will reset the theme to the default "Spring".
